projects.name: Mindkraft25 Website
projects.tech_stack: Django, SQLite, Redis, SMTP, JWT, Docker, AWS
projects.description: Led backend development and deployment for the official website of Karunya Institute’s national-level tech fest. Implemented a registration tracker and containerized the app using Docker.

projects.name: Zukify
projects.description: Co-developed an API testing and debugging web app similar to Postman. Built the backend using Golang and the frontend using React.js, collaborating closely with a teammate.

projects.name: HloMail
projects.description: Built an API for seamless email integration, powering automated no-reply notifications and contact form submissions. Deployed the solution as a live service at hlomail.in.

projects.name: Photogram
projects.description: Developed a dynamic media-sharing platform supporting user registration, login, posts, likes, and comments. Implemented server-side rendering in PHP for efficient frontend rendering.

projects.name: AgriGenesis
projects.description: Developed a Laravel RESTful API for user registration, login, and post creation during a summer internship at Nandha InfoTech.

projects.name: CRATOSS
projects.description: Developed a chat-bot for IoT content. Built the backend for a real-time crop management system tailored for farmers.

leadership_justification: Led backend development and deployment for MindKraft 2025
candidate_fit_summary: The candidate is a software developer with no medical background or relevant experience, making them unsuitable for the General Physician role.
fit_score_reason: The candidate lacks the required medical degree (MBBS or equivalent), medical license, and clinical experience necessary for the General Physician role.
